des:
"Vayu" is a brand name of DSPWorks IoT-based smart BLDC fans.

"Vayu" is a Sanskrit word for "Fresh Air".

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on/off or run fan at a specific speed.
Also, you can ask Alexa to turn on/off or set the LED light to specific intensity.

There’s no need to go to the switch to control fan or led - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show.
Follow these simple steps to connect Alexa with your Vayu products:
1. Download "VAYU" app in the Google play store.
2. Register a VAYU account in our "VAYU" app.
3. Configure fan in our “VAYU" app and change the appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Room Fan" skills.
5. Use your VAYU account to log in and complete the linking.
9. Now all setup is finished.
10. Then just ask "Alexa, discover devices"

You can enjoy the voice control on your fan like these:
“Alexa, turn on FAN"
“Alexa, turn off FAN"
“Alexa, set FAN to 4"
“Alexa, set FAN to boost speed"
“Alexa, set FAN to normal speed"
“Alexa, set FAN to low speed"
“Alexa, turn on FAN LIGHT"
“Alexa, dim FAN LIGHT"
“Alexa, brighten FAN LIGHT"
- and many more.

If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email: voiceassistant@dspworks.in
